pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:2.1.7: For further discussion of kappāsika, “cotton”, and bhaṅga, “hemp”, see Appendix IV: Plants, in volume 2 of this series.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc43:2.1.10: Sp 2.988: Ujjavujjaveti yattakaṁ hatthena añchitaṁ hoti, tasmiṁ takkamhi veṭhite ekā āpatti, “Ujjavujjava: however much is pulled by hand, there is one offense when the spindle is turned.”
